pages.text: The $(major)Anti-Field Orb/$ allows you to $(minor)temporarily disable certain Genes/$.$(br2)Specifically, it disables the $(l:geneticsresequenced:genes/item_attraction_field)Item Attraction Field/$ and $(l:geneticsresequenced:genes/xp_attraction_field)XP Attraction Field/$ when enabled.$(br2)The $(l:geneticsresequenced:blocks/anti_field_block)Anti-Field Block/$ functions similarly, but in block form.
The Anti-Field Orb can be toggled by right-clicking it while held.
